title: Are the Bidens Talking Too Much?
sub_head: NBC reports the President is unhappy; meanwhile brother James chats with the Washington Post.
body:
This column recently advised President Joe Biden to stop speaking in public, at least when the topic is important. Mr. Bidenâ€™s habit of making ill-considered spontaneous remarks argues for carefully crafted statements of policy. Ideally, the President would take special pains to avoid off-the-cuff comments about nuclear-armed regimes. It now appears that some people in the White House agree with this column.
Unfortunately the President is not among them. Carol Lee, Peter Nicholas, Kristen Welker and Courtney Kube of NBC News report:
